title: Apache Draven (Found on DeviantArt)

embed.description: My Entry for Polycount & Riot Games Art Contest. www.polycount.com/forum/showth... There were two options in front of Draven, the Noxus commander, who is fatally wounded by Demacian comman...

body:
http://sadecekaan.deviantart.com/art/Apache-DRAVEN-Splash-Art-500354926

I never realized how much I needed this. This has to be one of the best skin concepts I've seen for Draven... ever. Riot needs to make this a skin.

replies.body: As long as he has a taunt where he turns into a helicopter, Transformers style.

> [{quoted}](name=Laraso,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=GXFtZbLk,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-15T15:22:34.642+0000)
> As long as he has a taunt where he turns into a helicopter, Transformers style.

That would probably be the recall animation
Oh, that's true. It would work way better as a recall.
His taunt should have his chest unfurl and a small cannon extend out before being put away (Transformers joke)
bump bump until it happens rito plz take my money
Seems awesome! i like it! and yea it will be much better if he could turn his blades into propellers and fly around as a taunt or sth{{champion:119}}
